column2: The people of Burgundy, having separated themselves from the majority of the French and Occitan peoples, have adopted their own culture. From this day until their last they will be known as the Burgundian people!
The people of Tuscany, having separated themselves from the majority of the Italian peoples, have adopted their own culture. From this day until their last they will be known as the Tuscan people!
The people of Genoa, having separated themselves from the majority of the Italian peoples, have adopted their own culture. From this day until their last they will be known as the Ligurian people!

The people of Silesia, having separated themselves from the majority of the Polish peoples, have adopted their own culture. From this day until their last they will be known as the Silesian people!
